publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-216 John Lamont: Melrose Book Festival—That the Parliament notes that Melrose is holding its annual book festival from 21 to 24 June 2007; recognises the importance of such cultural events for the Borders and for Scotland as a whole; congratulates the organisers and sponsors for their work in producing another exciting schedule of events, and wishes the visitors and participants a successful and interesting weekend.
